HomePage.title: Transform Your Photos into Beautiful Prints
HomePage.description: Upload your photos and we'll enhance them using AI technology, creating stunning high-quality prints ready to be framed and displayed.

Upload.title: Upload Your Photo
Upload.description: Choose a photo to enhance and print. We accept JPG, PNG, and TIFF files up to 25MB.
Upload.dragDropTitle: Drag and drop your image here
Upload.dragDropDescription: or click to select a file
Upload.fileRequirements: JPEG, PNG, or TIFF up to 25MB

errors.fileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a JPEG, PNG, or TIFF file.
errors.fileSize: File is too large. Maximum size is 25MB.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

Format.title: Choose Your Print Format
Format.comingSoon: Size and paper options coming soon...
